name: 賴冠廷
objective:
在本課程中，學生將熟習應用程式設計之環境、方法、及原則，內容含：
（１）Linux作業系統
（２）雲端環境與架構(AWS, Azure等等)
（３）Android程式設計

In this class, the students will learn how to develop software applications via hands-on labs. The topics include:
(1) Linux OS
(2) Cloud Computing Environments and Architecture (AWS, Azure, etc.)
(3) Android Programming
schedule:
Lab 1: Linux Programming
Lab 2: Creating a Cloud server (Azure)
Lab 3: Android Hello World
Lab 4: Activity and Layout
Lab 5: Broadcast
Lab 6: Stop watch
Lab 7: Navbar
Lab 8: Google Map
Lab 9: Constraint Layout
Lab 10: Fragments
Lab 11: Dynamic Fragments
Lab 12: sqlite
Lab 13: Camera APP
Lab 14: TensorFlow lite
materials:
使用老師上課講義
課程網頁: http://www.aiotlab.org/teaching/android.html
